about_me.des: Full-Stack developer with significant experience as CEO. Team member in the Galaxy project. Love for Python, ReactJS, C# - Open to any language. Managed multiple projects and teams. Valuable skills with Mac, Linux, Trello/VSTS, Scrum, Git, Vim, and much more.

projects.gonramp: G-Onramp is a project to engage biologists with Big Data using interactive genome annotation. Built as Galaxy Project team member
projects.jscoverageqc: JsCoverageQC is a port, from Java to ReactJS, of a next generation sequencing (NGS) quality control (QC) report generator. Built as Freelancer for Galaxy Project.
projects.pousse_de_bambin: Pousse De Bambin is a website for parents to create and share the birthlist of their coming newborn. Built as CEO/CTO, in the startup incubator EM Lyon.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
